title: Every time I try logging on, it instantly says"Did not receive a response from the server; retrying"
body: I have no idea why it's doing this, please help me ._.

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection is having a hard time reaching our servers. There could be a few different things causing this, but the biggest potential culprits are listed in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so I strongly recommend giving it a look.

Let me know if those steps resolved this issue.
It started working after i forced a repatch :P
